text:
Local Government Act Order 2001

After consultation with the Sorell Council and being satisfied that it is appropriate to do so because there are no reasonable prospects of selling the relevant land within a reasonable time, I make the following order under section 140(2) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

4 February 2001

J. A. BACON

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Act Order 2001 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to Council
    The land situated at 20 Raynors Road at Midway Point in Tasmania comprised in Folio of the Register Volume 63343, Folio 13 is declared to be transferred to the Sorell Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 February 2001

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
